mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter: Bushrod Washington Herbert to John Augustine Washington III, Mount Vernon, undated
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Herbert, Bushrod Washington, -1888
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A letter signed BWH, possibly from Bushrod Washington Herbert, to his cousin John Augustine Washington III. In the letter, BWH asks what Remington is going to do with Muddy Hole Farm. If Remington sells, BWH thinks John Augustine should rent it to West Ford "as before."
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: John Augustine Washington III and Descendants Papers
